DOC.brief_summary: By use Rapid Cardiac Evaluation ( RACE ) pathway Emergency Department ( ED ) , investigator effectively reduce ED wait time ED length stay decrease overall hospital admission telemetry admission . In addition , investigator hypothesize decrease mortality patient admit cardiac evaluation increase patient health care provider ratio .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Management Acute Coronary Syndromes Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: Chief complaint chest pain 35 year old great ST elevation MI New Left Bundle Branch Block Admission regardless test result Leaving ED medical advice
